revised_title: Geographical Description and Map of the Kingdom of Tunis
tldr: The author, Thomas Shaw, provides a geographical description and map of the Kingdom of Tunis, detailing its boundaries, cities, and historical context. He also discusses the cure for intermittent fevers using a local plant species. Shaw's account offers valuable insights into the region's geography, history, and medicinal practices.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Geography
